se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config.HandlerConfiguration

Packages that use HandlerConfiguration
Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config
Core interfaces and classes for handling configuration of SignService handlers and engines.

  • Uses of HandlerConfiguration in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config

    Classes in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config that implement HandlerConfiguration
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractHandlerConfiguration<T extends SignServiceHandler>
    An abstract base class for HandlerConfigurationÂ implementations that handles the base functionality for a configuration object.
    class 
    BeanReferenceHandlerConfiguration<T extends SignServiceHandler>
    A BeanReferenceHandlerConfiguration class is used when no actual handler configuration is made and instead an already configured bean of the particular handler type is referenced using AbstractHandlerConfiguration.setBeanName(String).

    Method parameters in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config with type arguments of type HandlerConfiguration
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AbstractHandlerConfiguration.resolveDefaultConfigRef(Function<String,HandlerConfiguration<T>> resolver)
    If a default configuration reference has been assigned (needsDefaultConfigResolving() returns true) the reference needs to be resolved into a HandlerConfiguration object, and this object needs to be merged with our configuration instance.
    void
    HandlerConfiguration.resolveDefaultConfigRef(Function<String,HandlerConfiguration<T>> resolver)
    If a default configuration reference has been assigned (needsDefaultConfigResolving() returns true) the reference needs to be resolved into a HandlerConfiguration object, and this object needs to be merged with our configuration instance.
